review: I really do like the speed of the device, but there are a couple of things that caused me to knock a couple of stars off of the device.  For starters I have a large collection (about 200 movies) that I can watch via VUDU and since the it is currently not an amazon app, I cannot watch any of these movies on this device (I hear that I can watch most of them via the flixter app, but they are in SD and also not all movies will show up).  Granted I did know this going into the purchase, so if you don't care about VUDU, think of this as a 4-star review. The other issue that I have is that the Sling TV app seems to not work as well as I was hoping.  I was planning on watching last nights episode of the walking dead, but apparently it would not authorize the device.  I lowered my cable package for this device and Sling TV, but will now have to pay for an episode to be able to see last nights episode.  Hopefully I can figure out why I was having issues with the SlingTV app.

review: I went ahead and bought this during their Cyber Monday sale, as it was $69 rather than the regular price of $99. I love it, and can be entertained for hours. If I wasn't a Prime member, however, I don't think it would be as worthwhile. I do like the fact that there isn't a monthly subscription attached, but I am paying for Netflix, which I access on my Fire TV, and again, it might not be something I would use as much without that.
